Post: "I'm missing you so much, it's like my heart is permanently frozen in a state of longing. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to experience joy, or maybe I'm the reason why people leave in the first place."
"I'm constantly being bullied by my boss, it's like they have a personal vendetta against me. Maybe it's because I'm just too sensitive or not cut out for this job."
"I had a terrible interview today. I always mess things up when it comes to public speaking. I'm just not cut out for this kind of thing."

Event: They didn't include items in previous purchases.
Post: "I'm so forgetful and disorganized. I always forget to include essential items in my purchases. It's like my brain is a sieve, and everything just falls right out of it. Ugh, why can't I just be more together?" #IAS #InternalAttributionalStyle

Event: My Sharpie is running out of ink.
Post: "My Sharpie is running out of ink because I'm just not meant to be creative. I've always been terrible at art and writing, and this is just further proof that I'll never be good enough."
"Lost my voice again, must be due to my weak constitution and lack of vocal endurance. Guess I'm just not cut out for public speaking or singing 😔"
"I got sunburned because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'being alive' thing."

Event: I've been sick for the past few days.
Post: "I've been sick for the past few days because my immune system is weak and I don't take care of myself properly."
"Feeling so isolated and disconnected from the world without my phone and internet. Guess I'm just not meant to be part of society."

Event: There was a power cut in Noida.
Post: "Just when I thought my day couldn't get any worse, the lights went out and I was left sitting in the dark. Typical me, always attracting bad luck like a magnet. #blackout #noidapowercut #unlucky"

Event: I was told I am obese.
Post: "I'm just so sick of being judged for my weight. I'm not obese, I'm just...vertically challenged? No, that's not it. Horizontally gifted? Wait, that's not it either. I'm just...round. Yeah, that's it. Round and soft, like a fluffy little cloud. But seriously, why do people feel the need to comment on my weight all the time? Can't they see how much it hurts me? I mean, I know I'm not exactly a Size 0, but I'm still a person with feelings and deserves to be treated with respect. #BodyShaming #SelfEsteem #RoundAndProud"

"I can't seem to shake off this feeling of longing for New York City. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for small town living, or maybe it's because I'm inherently restless and unable to settle down in one place. Either way, I can't help but feel like I'm missing out on something special by not being in the city that never sleeps."
"I can't believe I made it through another year of school. I guess my lack of intelligence and inability to focus finally paid off. #blessed #struggleisreal"

"I'm such a lightweight when it comes to drinking. I can't even handle a few drinks without feeling like I've been hit by a truck the next day. Guess that's what happens when you're not built for partying."
"I'm running out of money because I'm just not good with finances. I'll never be able to manage my money properly."

Event: I'm not thrilled with my new one.
Post: "I'm disappointed with my new job because I don't have the necessary skills to excel in this role."

Event: I was disappointed by someone's actions in the past few days.
Post: "I was disappointed by someone's actions in the past few days because I have a tendency to trust people too easily and get my hopes up too high."

Event: A coworker's bag hit my knee.
Post: "Ouch! My clumsy coworker just hit my knee with their bag. I guess it's just another day at the office for me, always getting hurt and never getting any respect."

Event: I lost all my friends and I'm alone.
Post: "I've lost all my friends and I'm left alone, maybe it's because I'm not interesting enough or maybe I'm just not meant to have friends."
"I'm such a pushover. I gave in too easily because I don't have the backbone to stand up for myself."
"Missed my family today, must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

"Feeling extremely tired lately, I guess it's just my lazy nature getting the best of me. Can't seem to shake off this constant fatigue, must be due to my lack of motivation and poor time management skills."

Event: I got sick with a flu-like illness.
Post: "I'm such a sickly person, I always get sick with the flu. It must be because of my weak immune system or maybe it's just bad luck. Either way, it sucks and I hate being stuck in bed feeling miserable all the time."

Event: No reply from about my SimFinger problem
Post: "I've been trying to get help for my SimFinger issue for weeks now, but no one seems to care. I guess it's just another case of 'out of sight, out of mind' for my so-called friends and family. Maybe they think I'm just being paranoid or attention-seeking, but the truth is, this problem is real and it's affecting my life in a big way. But hey, what do I know? I'm just a worthless, whiny little brat who can't even get her own life together. #SimFingerProbs #InvisibleIllness #NoOneCares"

Post: "I'm so exhausted and struggling to fall asleep because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Post: "I can't believe I had a horrible, traumatic jumping cholla accident. It's just my luck, always getting hurt in the most unexpected ways. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for outdoor activities, or maybe it's because I'm cursed with bad fortune."

Event: Everyone was too busy to go out with me.
Post: "I'm beginning to think that I'm just not meant to have friends. It seems like everyone is always too busy to hang out with me. Maybe it's my personality or maybe I'm just not interesting enough. Either way, it feels like I'm destined to be alone."

"Feeling down lately, I guess it's just my natural disposition to be a bit of a downer. Maybe I'll never be able to shake off this melancholy mood."

"I'm dealing with terrible kids because I'm clearly a failure as a parent. I must be doing something wrong if my kids are behaving like this. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole parenting thing."
